name: Combo Bard - Demoralize and Disarm: Bard 24 / Fighter 6 / RDD 10
author: EasternPromises

posts.author: EasternPromises
posts.content:
Alright guys, been playing this one for a while and he packs a wallop. I loved playing the Death Metal Bardbarian so much because I noticed how much easier it was to taunt and knock down fighters when I dropped their concentration and discipline by 10 or so with Curse Song. So I revisited this concept to develop an invisibility flanker that could take advantage of all the combat maneuver / curse song combos.

This build gets full bard undispellability, taunt+expertise out the gate, excellent AB and damage, and full imp KD and disarm. Simply maneuver to your opponent invisible, curse them, then open with KD, taunt-cancel, and then disarm. If you get good at it it is deadly. You are stacking up to -13 to their skills, -11 to their AC, and are buffed yourself. Once their weapon in on the ground simply pummel away with more KD goodness. Refresh Taunt with the expertise/cancel combo when needed. Curse song lasts 10 rounds to start but 100 rounds later on, meaning you can just focus on mocking your opponent into submission.

Also Dev crit is nerfed where I play, so might as well enjoy your extra feats.

Greataxe is chosen because it resembles a guitar :) Heavy flail and greatsword are also good picks.
